ygData.subject: Re: Dark Elf Cleric
ygData.msgSnippet: I am currently level 28.  My clerics str is 73 and has a wisdom of 134. My only armor peices consit of  Bronze gloves, Legs, Boots, chest, Steel arms.    Once
ygData.messageBody:
I am currently level 28. My clerics str is 73 and has a wisdom of 134.
My only armor peices consit of Bronze gloves, Legs, Boots, chest, Steel
arms. Once you start getting widom items to replace your armor you
weight problem will go away. When I have nothing except what I;m wearing
my str weight is like 63..


Mr. J Daniels


On Wed, 9 Jun 1999, Allsar wrote:

> From: "Allsar" <bogey@...>
>
> Well met fellow dark elf cleric. I am a level 21 dark elf cleric and have a
> base str of 70 (which was a mistake also). Many clerics have str of 75 and
> higher, but oh well whats done is done. I have some bronze pieces
> (breastplate, girdle, vambrace, helm, gloves) and also a blood stained
> mantle which helps a lot with the +3 strength. I'm constantly 73/73 which
> really limits your armor capabilities. But theres many good magical pieces
> of armor that weigh less than the bronze plate.
> Another possibility (one that i am pursuing now) is to get the cracked
> darkwood shield from High Hold Pass which is AC 12, Weight 5, and strength
> +9. There are also flesh rings off Bonecracker in Najena which give off +2
> strength.
> Allsar Olath`Vlos - Rathe
> -----Original Message-----
> From: XxKommiexX@... <XxKommiexX@...>
> To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
> Date: Wednesday, June 09, 1999 3:14 PM
> Subject: [EQ-Clerics] Dark Elf Cleric
>
>
> >From: XxKommiexX@...
> >
> >I was wondering as a Dark Elf Cleric, can they really wear plate? Right
> now,
> >I think I made the mistake of only having 65 str. That seems to be too
> little
> >to wear plate later on, let alone the heavy bronze. If this isn't the case,
> >please let me know so I can jump for joy. Thanks much.
> >
> >Sarn, Dark Elf Cleric
> >~Veeshan~
> >
